abilities.name: Whiteout
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team plus additional damage for every Blue tile on the board.

abilities.name: Build/Punch a Snowman
abilities.description: Build: Stuns a target enemy. Punch: Deals damage to a target enemy.

abilities.name: Cold As Ice
abilities.description: Transforms some Red tiles into Blue tiles and drains Red AP from the enemy team.

abilities.name: Perfect Being
abilities.description: Heals the Silver Surfer and Creates Charged Tiles. (PASSIVE) Silver Surfer cannot be stunned.

abilities.name: Cosmic Beam
abilities.description: Deals damage to the target and creates Charged tiles

abilities.name: Silver Singularity
abilities.description: Transforms a chosen basic tile into a Colorless Black Hole countdown tile which cannot be matched and does not fall.  Every turn it consumes random basic adjacent tiles, dealing damage and generating AP.

abilities.name: Flexibility
abilities.description: Stuns the enemy and creates Blue Protect tiles

abilities.name: Master of the Fantastic
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy matches a friendly special tile, heals himself and generates 1 Green AP for each other Fantastic Four member on the team

abilities.name: Imaginaut
abilities.description: Places a Black Countdown tile that while on the board, causes friendly Red, Green, and Yellow matches to do extra damage and increase the duration of these tiles by 1.

abilities.name: Wings of Liberty
abilities.description: Transforms all basic yellow tiles on the board into protect tiles

abilities.name: Aerial Avenger
abilities.description: Whenever his team makes a Blue match, strengthens some friendly special tiles and reduces a friendly cooldown tile.

abilities.name: Dive Bomb
abilities.description: Deals damage to targeted enemy, plus additional damage for every friendly Protect tile.

abilities.name: Web Swing
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted enemy and adds a web tile to the board. If there's already a web tile, it deals additional damage.

abilities.name: All Tied Up
abilities.description: Stuns the target and adds a web tile to the board.

abilities.name: Spectacular Strategy
abilities.description: Converts random basic tiles into critical tiles and adds web tiles to the board.

abilities.name: Out of Bullets
abilities.description: Hits the enemy for big damage and heals Deadpool.

abilities.name: X-Enforcer
abilities.description: When any of Deadpool's allies take a certain amount of damage, Deadpool creates a cooldown tile that damages the enemy.

abilities.name: Countdown for What
abilities.description: Creates countdown tiles on the enemy teams strongest tiles that if destroyed they reach zero deals damage to the enemy team.

abilities.name: Lethal Improvisation
abilities.description: Turns 2 selected Attack, Protect, or Strike tiles to basic tiles and deals damage to the targeted enemy.

abilities.name: Contract Killer
abilities.description: If Bullseye downs an opponent he creates Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Deadly Precision
abilities.description: Destroys chosen basic tiles and deals damage. Destroyed tiles don't generate AP.

abilities.name: Mind Over Matter
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team and converts random enemy special tiles to basic tiles.

abilities.name: Psychic Feedback
abilities.description: When the opponent makes a Match 5, destroys AP in their strongest color, stuns the enemy team, and deals damage to the enemy team.

abilities.name: Full of Surprises
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team and creates random Strike, Attack, or Protect tiles.

abilities.name: Pym Particles
abilities.description: Creates a Purple trap tile that creates Purple Attack tiles each turn.

abilities.name: Small Time Crooks
abilities.description: Creates a Blue Countdown tile that steals enemy special tiles every turn.

abilities.name: Ants! Ants! Ants!
abilities.description: Creates Red Countdown Tile that create Yellow Strike tiles when activated.  At the beginning of each turn deal damage for each Ants! Ants! Ants! tile.

abilities.name: Mjolnir's Might
abilities.description: Deals damage to a single target and adds Yellow tiles to the board.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Deals damage to a single target and adds Green tiles to the board.

abilities.name: Call The Storm
abilities.description: Deals aoe damage and double the damage to the primary target.

abilities.name: Master Plan
abilities.description: Whenever the team makes a Match-5 or greater, it generates AP in the team's strongest color and deals damage to a single target.

abilities.name: Blind Spot
abilities.description: Creates an invisibility tile that targets Professor X. While invisible if Professor X makes a match, then strengthen some friendly Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Psychic Convergence
abilities.description: Whenever an ally uses an ability, convert a random basic tile to a Strike tile.

abilities.name: Shou-Lao Fang Strike
abilities.description: Deals damage to a single target and generates Strike tiles. If the team has 12 or more Black AP, then bonus Strike tiles are created.

abilities.name: Iron Fist of K'un-Lun
abilities.description: If the team has less than 12 Black AP, add black tiles to the board. If the team has 12 or more Black AP, deal damage to a single target.

abilities.name: Exquisite Technique
abilities.description: At the beginning of every turn, if there are no friendly Attack tiles, create a Green Attack tile.

abilities.name: Righteous Uppercut
abilities.description: Deals single target damage. Deals bonus damage for every non-downed ally.

abilities.name: Unbreakable
abilities.description: At the beginning of every turn, if there are no friendly Protect tiles on the board, creates a Red Protect tile.

abilities.name: Jab, Jab, Cross
abilities.description: Deals single target damage and places a countdown tile. While it is on the board, Jab, Jab, Cross deals bonus damage.

abilities.name: Twin Pistols
abilities.description: Destoys two selected 3x3 blocks of tiles, dealing damage to a single target per tile. Does not generate AP. Ends the turn.

abilities.name: Dormammu's Aid
abilities.description: Each turn there are more than a certain number of tiles in a color, steal that color

abilities.name: Intimidation
abilities.description: Damages the targeted character and reduces the timer on a number of friendly Countdown tiles by 1.

abilities.name: Coercive Field
abilities.description: Creates Protect tiles.

abilities.name: Polarizing Force
abilities.description: Destroys all team up tiles doing damage to the targeted character per tile destroyed.  Does not generate AP.

abilities.name: Magnetized Projectiles
abilities.description: Swaps pairs of red and blue tiles dealing damage for each swap.

abilities.name: Sentinel of Liberty
abilities.description: Transform several chosen basic tiles into Yellow Protect tiles.

abilities.name: Star Spangled Avenger
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted character and turns a targeted tile into a Countdown tile that returns Red AP.

abilities.name: Peacemaker
abilities.description: Stuns the targeted character and turns a targeted tile into a Countdown tile that returns Blue AP.  The Countdown tile convers to a Protect tile when activated.

abilities.name: Berserker Rage
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted character and creates Strike tiles for each team.

abilities.name: Best There Is
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted character for each tile on the board that bears his icon and creates Red Strike tiles for each team.

abilities.name: Healing Factor
abilities.description: Recovers health.

abilities.name: Nightstalker
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted character and creates a Green Cooldown tile activates every turn to drain AP from the enemy team's strongest color.

abilities.name: Keep Your Enemies Closer
abilities.description: Creates a Purple Attack Tile with bonus strength for each friendly Strike tile on the board.

abilities.name: The Thirst
abilities.description: If there are more than a certain number of Red tiles on the board, converts random basic Red tiles into Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Optic Blasts
abilities.description: Destroys a random row of tiles and deals damage to the targeted character. Does not generate AP.

abilities.name: Mutant Revolutionary
abilities.description: Converts random Team Up tiles into basic Red tiles.

abilities.name: Full Blast
abilities.description: Deals 822 damage to the targeted character. If there are more than 9 Red tiles on the board he deals additional damage but stuns himself for a certain number of turns.

abilities.name: Smite
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted enemy and additional damage per charged tile on the board. Adds charged tiles to the board.

abilities.name: Striking Distance
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team and converts enemy special tiles into charged tiles.

abilities.name: Power Surge
abilities.description: Stuns the targeted enmy and converts random Red, Blue, or Yellow basic tiles into Charged tiles.

abilities.name: Battleplan
abilities.description: Converts 3 basic Yellow tiles to Strike tiles. If the team has 12 or more Team-Up AP, increases the strength of the created Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Defense Grid
abilities.description: Places a Blue Countdown tile that converts a basic color tile to a Protect tile every 2 turns.  If 5 or more Protect tiles are in play, conversion is suspended.

abilities.name: Rage of the Panther
abilities.description: Deals damage to each enemy but the enemy team gains 5 AP in their strongest color.

abilities.name: X-Force
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted enemy and destroys tiles in 3x3 X-Shaped patterns. Does not generate AP.

abilities.name: Surgical Strike
abilities.description: Destroys every tile in the enemy team's strongest color, dealing damage per tile. Does not generate AP.

abilities.name: Recovery
abilities.description: Places a 3-turn Yellow Countdown tile that heals when activated. If the Countdown tile is matched, destroys random tiles dealing damage per tile.

abilities.name: Healing & Heat
abilities.description: Every turn Daken recovers health. If there are fewer than a certain number of tiles, then he loses health instead.

abilities.name: Pheromone Rage
abilities.description: Whenever anyone makes a Green match, add Red Strike tiles to the board.

abilities.name: Chemical Reaction
abilities.description: Damages the targeted enemy and converts Strike tiles to basic tiles, doing bonus damage per Strike tile converted.

abilities.name: Avengers Assemble!
abilities.description: Various abilities.

abilities.name: Demolition
abilities.description: Creates 2 trap tiles that, when matched by the enemy detonate dealing damage but not generating AP. If you match a trap it detonates dealing damage.

abilities.name: Escape Plan
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted enemy and creates a Countdown that, when activated, steals AP from the enemy's strongest color before converting to a Strike tile.

abilities.name: Trickery
abilities.description: Transforms enemy Strike tiles into friendly Protect tiles and enemy Protect tiles into friendly Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Illusions
abilities.description: Changes the location of colored tiles.

abilities.name: Mischief
abilities.description: If the enemy team makes a match-4 of any color, creates Countdown tiles which steal 2 AP of a random color.

abilities.name: Repulsor Punch
abilities.description: Depletes his team's Red AP, dealing damage for each.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: Deals damage to Iron Man, but gains Red AP and generates 2 Yellow Strike Tiles.

abilities.name: Hulk-Proof
abilities.description: Converts Green tiles to Red and creates Blue Protect tiles.

abilities.name: Aggressive Recon
abilities.description: Steals AP from the enemy team in various colors.

abilities.name: Anti-Gravity Device
abilities.description: Increases enemy Countdown timers and restores a burst of health to the team.

abilities.name: Espionage
abilities.description: Whenever Black Widow attacks making colors in certain colors, she steals that color AP from the enemy team and deals additional damage.

abilities.name: Summon Demons
abilities.description: Converts basic Red tiles into Attack tiles.

abilities.name: Technopathic Strike
abilities.description: Transforms basic Blue tiles to Black tiles.

abilities.name: Diabolical Plot
abilities.description: Each turn Doom places a purple Trap tile. When he activates the ability, all Trap tiles are disarmed and damage is done to the current target.

abilities.name: Bring Out The Best
abilities.description: Whenever an ally fires an ability, gives the team a burst of health.

abilities.name: Inhuman Stretchiness
abilities.description: Converts a chosen basic tiles and additional random basic tiles of the same color to Green.

abilities.name: Embiggened Bash
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team.

abilities.name: A Little Off the Top
abilities.description: Deals a percent of the targeted enemy's current health in damage.

abilities.name: Whales! Whales! Whales!
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team. Using Deadpool Points will kill the entire enemy team.

abilities.name: Life of the Party
abilities.description: If an ally with less health than Deadpool will take more than a certain amount of damage, Deadpool will take the damage instead, and creates a Black Countdown tile that will restore health when it activates.

abilities.name: Thunderous Clap
abilities.description: Does damage to the targeted enemy for and destroys tiles based on how much Green AP the team has.

abilities.name: Smash
abilities.description: Consumes up to 10 of the team's Green AP and damages the target based on how much Green AP the team has remaining.  Does 30% of the damage to allies if there are more than 10 Green tiles on the board.

abilities.name: Anger
abilities.description: When damaged for over 5% of his health, a random basic Black tile becomes a 1 turn Countdown that changes basic tiles to Green.

abilities.name: Wilson's Gambit
abilities.description: Damages the target. If there is at least one friendly Countdown tile on the board, Kingpin destroys one friendly Countdown tile and deals additional damage.

abilities.name: The Fisk Defense
abilities.description: Depletes AP of the enemy's strongest color and generates Yellow AP for his team.

abilities.name: Maggia Pawns
abilities.description: Creates various Countdown tiles with various effects.

abilities.name: I am Groot
abilities.description: If Rocket & Groot are below 25% health and the team makes a yellow match, destroys all Team-Up tiles on the board, not dealing damage but healing for each tile. Does not generate AP.

abilities.name: Blammo! We Got Ya!
abilities.description: Punches a 2x2 hole in the center of the board and destroys additional tiles for each 2 Green AP the team has. Deals damage per tile destroyed but does not generate AP.

abilities.name: I Got A Plan
abilities.description: Places a Countdown tile on any basic tile. When activated it transforms basic Blue tiles into Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Sniper Rifle
abilities.description: Destroys a reticle shaped pattern and deals damage for each tile destroyed.

abilities.name: Pistol
abilities.description: Destroys targeted blocks of tiles, dealing damage for each tile destroyed.

abilities.name: Deceptive Tactics
abilities.description: Converts basic color tiles into Green tiles.

abilities.name: Inspiration
abilities.description: When the team makes a yellow match, Falcon improves the strength of several friendly Protect, Strike, or Attack tiles.

abilities.name: Redwing
abilities.description: If the team has at least a certain amount of Blue AP, Redwing will convert an enemy special tile into a Countdown tile. While the Countdown tile is active, Redwing will not target any other tiles.

abilities.name: Bird Strike
abilities.description: Creates Protect tiles.

abilities.name: Onslaught
abilities.description: Depletes the team's Green AP and deals damage for each. Also grants the enemy team 1 Green AP for every 2 consumed.

abilities.name: Rampage
abilities.description: Delas damage to the enemy team. Bonus damage if Ares is low on health.

abilities.name: Sunder
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted enemy and himself. Creates a Countdown tile that does damage to the targeted enemy and heals himself.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted enemy and destroys 2 red tiles.

abilities.name: Inferno
abilities.description: Converts up to 8 basic color tiles into Attack tiles, but depletes the team's Blue, Purple, and Yellow AP by 30%.

abilities.name: Flame Jet
abilities.description: Creates a Green Countdown tile that activates every turn, dealing damage for every Green AP the team has. Costs 1 Green AP per turn.

abilities.name: Reality Crush
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team and stuns a random enemy.

abilities.name: Hex Bolt
abilities.description: Select one basic tile to destroy it and random non-friendly tiles around it.

abilities.name: Arcane Incantation
abilities.description: If one does not already exist, creates a Countdown tile that transforms adjacent basic tiles to Purple when activated.

abilities.name: Radar Sense
abilities.description: Converts random enemy Strike, Protect, or Attack tiles to basic tiles and deals damage for each tile converted.

abilities.name: Billy Club
abilities.description: Stuns the target and creates a Countdown tile that stuns and creates a new Billy Club Countdown tile. If you match it, Daredevil gains Blue AP.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: Creates a Red Trap tile that, when matched by the enemy deals damage. If you match the tile, the enemy takes damage and it changes locations.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.description: Creates a Countdown tile that stuns the target and steals 1 AP whenever the enemy matches specific color.

abilities.name: Infiltration
abilities.description: Transforms random basic tiles that are Red, Green, or Yellow into Purple or Black.

abilities.name: Masterstroke
abilities.description: Deals damage to the target and reduces both team's AP in certain colors by 2. If Mystique is shapeshifted, she destroys her shapeshift tile and deals additional damage.

abilities.name: Molotov Cocktail
abilities.description: Damages the enemy team and converts a random basic color tile to a Red Countdown tile that spreads fire every few turns, converts a random bsic color tile to a Red Attack tile.

abilities.name: Judgement
abilities.description: Destroys a 3x3 group fo tiles doing damage but not generating AP. Converts basic colors tile to a Strike tile.

abilities.name: Retribution
abilities.description: Damages the target. If they are low on health, he downs them.

abilities.name: Mjolnir's Might
abilities.description: Deals damage to a single target and adds Yellow tiles to the board.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.description: Deals damage to a single target and adds Green tiles to the board.

abilities.name: Call The Storm
abilities.description: Deals aoe damage and double the damage to the primary target.

abilities.name: Photonic Blasts
abilities.description: Deals damage to the target and destroys enemy Protect tiles. Does not generate AP.

abilities.name: Hypersonic Punch
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team and stuns the targeted enemy. Places an enemy Strike tile.

abilities.name: Energy Absorption
abilities.description: When Captain Marvel takes more than a certain amount of damage, she generates Red and Black AP.

abilities.name: Healing & Heat
abilities.description: Every turn Daken recovers health. If there are fewer than a certain number of tiles, then he loses health instead.

abilities.name: Pheromone Rage
abilities.description: Whenever anyone makes a Green match, add Red Strike tiles to the board.

abilities.name: Chemical Reaction
abilities.description: Damages the targeted enemy and converts Strike tiles to basic tiles, doing bonus damage per Strike tile converted.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted enemy and destroys 2 red tiles.

abilities.name: Inferno
abilities.description: Converts up to 8 basic color tiles into Attack tiles, but depletes the team's Blue, Purple, and Yellow AP by 30%.

abilities.name: Flame Jet
abilities.description: Creates a Green Countdown tile that activates every turn, dealing damage for every Green AP the team has. Costs 1 Green AP per turn.

abilities.name: Sentinel of Liberty
abilities.description: Transform several chosen basic tiles into Yellow Protect tiles.

abilities.name: Star Spangled Avenger
abilities.description: Deals damage to the targeted character and turns a targeted tile into a Countdown tile that returns Red AP.

abilities.name: Peacemaker
abilities.description: Stuns the targeted character and turns a targeted tile into a Countdown tile that returns Blue AP.  The Countdown tile convers to a Protect tile when activated.

abilities.name: Call the Cavalry
abilities.description: Create 1 yellow 1-turn S.H.I.E.L.D. Commander Countdown tile that creates 1 green Strike tile (PASSIVE) Whenever a friendly Countdown reaches 0, gain 1 random AP

abilities.name: Best Laid Plans
abilities.description: Choose 2 red or green basic tiles to Charge and swap.(PASSIVE) When you make a match while you have 6 or more Team-Up AP, spend 2 Team-Up AP to reduce 1 random friendly Countdown timer by 1

abilities.name: Super Secret Tech
abilities.description: Steal 2 random AP for each friendly Countdown tile (up to a maximum of 5 tiles).(PASSIVE) Whenever an ally activates a power, create 1 random 2-turn Countdown tile that deals 232 damage.

abilities.name: Quasi-Sonic Whisper
abilities.description: Destroys the middle two rows dealing damage. If you have at least 5 AP in all colors, he lets out a scream, draining all friendly colored AP, destroying the board and dealing damage to the enemy team. Destroyed tiles do not deal damage or generate AP

abilities.name: Energy Channeling
abilities.description: Every turn, creates Charged tile in the color most present on the board. If there are at least 4 Charged tiles on the board, deals damage to the target and deals damage to Black Bolt instead

abilities.name: The Silent King
abilities.description: If one does not exist, converts a random basic tile into a 3-turn Motivation tile targeting 1 other ally, increasing all their powers by 1 level (to a max of 5)

abilities.name: Panther's Prey
abilities.description: Choose an enemy and create a 3-turn black Countdown tile. While this tile is on the board and the chosen character would take damage, they suffer an extra damage

abilities.name: Spirit of Wakanda
abilities.description: Whenever you make a yellow match, if you have 11 or more Team-Up AP, spend 10 Team-Up AP and deal an extra damage to the target

abilities.name: Move... Or Be Moved
abilities.description: If Black Panther would take 2787 or more damage, negate 50% of that damage and stun him for 2 turns. Whenever black Panther returns from being Stunned or Invisible, he deals damage

abilities.name: Tell Me Everything
abilities.description: Deals damage and remove up to 3 random enemy Strike, Protect, Attack and Countdown tiles

abilities.name: Acrobatic Takedown
abilities.description: Deals damage. If the enemy has at least 12 AP in any color, deal additional damage. If this downs an enemy, destroy 4 enemy AP in a random color

abilities.name: red in My Ledger
abilities.description: Deals damage. If any allies are below 20% health, drain 2 random enemy AP and deal an extra damage. (PASSIVE) Whenever one of black Widows allies is stunned, stun a random enemy for 1 turn.

abilities.name: The Hunger
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) Blade resists his thirst for blood. If there are 10 or more red tiles on the board, Blade steels his resolve and converts a random basic tile to a strength 37 Strike tile at the beginning of the turn. When Blade's team reaches 9 or more red AP, this power transforms into The Bloodlust. Bloodlust: (PASSIVE) Blade can no longer resist his thirst for blood. Every turn, Blade consumes 1 red AP and deals damage to a random enemy. When Blade's team falls below 7 red AP, this power transforms back into The Hunger.

abilities.name: Tools of the Trade
abilities.description: Blade attacks with his arsenal, dealing damage to the enemy team. If Blade's team has 7 or more red AP, Blade uses his fangs in the attack, healing himself.

abilities.name: Supernatural Sense
abilities.description: Blade destroys 4 AP from the enemy team's strongest color. If Blade's team has 7 or more red AP, Blade also creates 2 red tiles.

abilities.name: Photonic Barrage
abilities.description: Converts a chosen basic black tile into a 5-turn Countdown tile that creates a Strike tile every turn, and deals damage when it expires.

abilities.name: Executive Decision
abilities.description: reduces a chosen friendly Countdown tile to 0. (PASSIVE) Whenever a friendly Countdown tile expires, improve 1 random friendly tile(s) by 56

abilities.name: Energy Manipulation
abilities.description: Whenever the opponent makes a match in their strongest color, gain 2 AP in your strongest color. If they are the same color, deal damage to the enemy team

abilities.name: Light-Knives
abilities.description: Deals damage to the target and removes up to 2 enemy Strike, Protect, or Attack tiles. If no such tiles exist, the damage is dealt to the enemy instead.

abilities.name: Child of Darkness
abilities.description: At the start of the turn, if there are at least 13 black tiles on the board, creates a red Attack tile. If not, converts up to 2 basic tiles to black.

abilities.name: Pocket Dimension
abilities.description: Deals 333 damage and replaces Cloak & Daggers powers with new powers. If there are at least 13 black tiles on the board, this power costs 3 AP less (to a minimum of 3).

abilities.name: Combined Forces
abilities.description: Deals damage and destroys a chosen basic tile. If you have 10 or more Team-Up AP, instead drain 10 Team-Up AP, deal damage and destroy a chosen row (tiles do not deal damage or generate AP)

abilities.name: Uncanny Strategist
abilities.description: Creates a 4-turn yellow Countdown tile. While one of these tiles is on the board, friendly Team-Up matches generate an additional 2 AP in the team's strongest color and increase the duration of these tiles by 1

abilities.name: Called Shot
abilities.description: Destroys the selected tile, all red basic tiles in a 3x3 area around a selected tile, generating AP and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Fighting Spirit
abilities.description: At the start of the turn, if Daredevil is below 30% health, he creates a strength 102 yellow Strike tile, then restores health for each friendly Strike tile on the board (max 5 tiles)

abilities.name: Hand-to-Hand
abilities.description: Create a 5-turn green Countdown tile that deals damage at the end of each turn. If you match it, recovers 5 green AP. If otherwise matched or destroyed, deals damage and creates another Hand-to-Hand tile if one doesn't exist.

abilities.name: Sonar Strike
abilities.description: Converts random enemy Strike, Protect, or Attack tiles to friendly Strike tiles, then stuns the target for turn(s).

abilities.name: Superior Science
abilities.description: Stuns the target for one turn and creates a 3-turn Countdown tile.  While on the board, it stuns the target for 1 turn each turn.  When it expires, the target takes damage and it creates 2 strength friendly Strike tiles

abilities.name: Tentacles
abilities.description: If he has fewer than 4 on the board, Doc Ock creates a Tentacle tile.  Then he deals damage for each Tentacle tile he controls. (PASSIVE) At the start of each turn, if Doctor Octopus is Stunned, his tentacles make a match for his team for each Tentacle tile he controls.

abilities.name: Cunning Scheme
abilities.description: Place a 10-turn Nuclear Reactor Countdown tile not eh board that deals 3974 damage to each enemy.  This power becomes Phase 2. Phase 2 costs 8 green AP:  Doctor Octopuss generator powers hospitals.  Upgrade the Nuclear Reactor tile to give a burst of health to each friendly character each turn.  This power becomes Phase 3. (PASSIVE) If the Reactor is matched, gain 11 green AP. If its destroyed, this power becomes Cunning scheme. Phase 3 costs 6 green AP: Upgrade the Nuclear Reactor tile so that it deals damage to each enemy each turn.  This power becomes Final Phase. (PASSIVE) If the Reactor is matched, gain 14 green AP.  If its destroyed, this power becomes Cunning Scheme. Final Phase costs 0 green AP: (PASSIVE) All his work has led to this perfect moment.  If Doc Ocks Nuclear Reactor is matched away when its timer reads 1 he wins the battle!  If Doc Ocks Nuclear Reactor is matched at another time, gain 18 green AP.  If its destroyed, this power becomes Cunning Scheme.

abilities.name: Crimson Bands of Cyttorak
abilities.description: Converts a chosen basic tile into a 2-turn Countdown tile, then stuns the target for 2 turns. The tile destroys 2 enemy AP of its color and deals damage each turn.

abilities.name: Eye of Agamotto
abilities.description: Remove up to 2 random enemy Attack tiles and gain 2 purple AP.

abilities.name: Flames of the Faltine
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) Whenever an enemy fires a power, deal damage to the target and gives a burst of health to the players team

abilities.name: Crimson Bands of Cyttorak
abilities.description: Converts a chosen basic tile into a 2-turn Countdown tile, then stuns the target for 2 turns. The tile destroys 2 enemy AP of its color and deals damage each turn.

abilities.name: Eye of Agamotto
abilities.description: If one does not exist, creates a colorless eye tile that activates each turn, removing a random enemy Attack tile. The Eye tile cant be matched and doesnt fall.

abilities.name: Flames of the Faltine
abilities.description: Deal 1533 damage. (PASSIVE) Whenever an enemy fires a power, deal 557 damage to the target.

abilities.name: The Destroyer
abilities.description: Removes up to 1 random friendly countdown tile. Deals damage to the enemy, plus damage for each tile removed.

abilities.name: Secret Weapon
abilities.description: Places a 3-turn Countdown tile on the board and ends the turn. If this tile is on the board when an ally fires a power, remove it and deal damage to the target enemy.

abilities.name: Slice & Dice
abilities.description: Deals damage to the target or more damage if the target has more then 90% of their total health.

abilities.name: Double-Double Cross
abilities.description: Elektra steals 1 enemy tile, but she also converts 3 random purple basic tiles into enemy Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Shadowstep
abilities.description: She converts 2 random basic black tiles into Trap tiles. If Elektra would take damage, the damage is negated and a Trap tile is destroyed, generating AP and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Crippling Blow
abilities.description: Deal damage and creates a 3-turn Countdown tile which deals damage to the enemy when it ticks down each turn.

abilities.name: Ragin' Cajun
abilities.description: Create 2 3-turn CD tiles, replacing up to 2 enemy Strike, Protect or Attack tiles, which each deal damage

abilities.name: Aces & Eights
abilities.description: Destroy up to 2 Charged or basic tiles, dealing an extra damage for each Charged tile destroyed this way. Then create 2 Charged tiles.

abilities.name: Stacked Deck
abilities.description: (Passive) At the start of the turn gain purple and red AP. Gambit's allies may not fire powers the same color as Gambit's active powers.

abilities.name: Ragin Cajun
abilities.description: Gambit unleashes a torrent of kinetically charged playing cards, targeted at his opponents' weak spots. Create 3 3-turn Countdown tiles, replacing up to 3 enemy Special tiles, which each deal damage

abilities.name: Aces & Eights
abilities.description: Destroy up to 2 random Charged or basic tiles, dealing an extra damage for each Charged tile destroyed this way. Then create 2 Charged tiles.

abilities.name: Stacked Deck
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) At the start of the turn, gain 3 purple AP and 3 red AP. Gambits allies may not fire powers the same color as Gambits active powers.

abilities.name: Deals Strike
abilities.description: Deals damage and creates a 2-turn red Countdown tile, targeting that character, which deals damage at the end of each turn.

abilities.name: The Deadliest Woman
abilities.description: Create 4 strength 32 purple Attack or Strike tiles. (PASSIVE) At the start of the turn, if all purple tiles are friendly special tiles, Gamora removes those tiles and downs the target.

abilities.name: Incapacitate
abilities.description: Turns the target for 1 turn. (PASSIVE) Whenever an enemy is Stunned, creates a purple Attack or Strike tile.

abilities.name: Burning Rubber
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team and creates 2 Attack tiles. If there are 6 friendly Attack tiles on the board, the fire burns hotter, dealing an additional damage.

abilities.name: Hellfire
abilities.description: Places a Countdown tile that spreads fire every 2 turns, dealing damage and creating an Attack tile, If the enemy team has more Villains than Heroes, the Countdown tile deals an additional amount of damage.

abilities.name: Penance Stare
abilities.description: Deals damage to the target enemy equal to a percentage of the total amount of damage they've dealt so far this mission.

abilities.name: Goblin Glider
abilities.description: Deals damage, disables this power and creates a 3-turn black Countdown tile which re-enables this power.

abilities.name: Trick or Treat
abilities.description: Creates 3 3-turn Countdown tiles of a chosen color. The Chosen tiles color will determine the Countdown tiles effect.

abilities.name: Goblin King
abilities.description: reduce up to 2 random friendly Countdown tiles by 1 turn. (PASSIVE) At the start of your turn, Fortify 2 random friendly Countdown tiles.

abilities.name: 'SPLOITS!
abilities.description: You know what would be really useful here? Some good, old-fashioned cheat codes. I know how to open the menu, but you're on your own for the rest. I mean, this game has a wiki, right? You'll figure it out.

abilities.name: Plot Armor
abilities.description: This much nonsense should be enough to buy me 2 Protect tiles. It'll also send my allies airborne for a turn. Oops?

abilities.name: Deus Ex Machina
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) Somehow, I feel like everything's going to work out. The Narrative always provides. In this case, The Narrative provides guns. At the start of the battle, a Gun tile appears on the board. If this tile is removed by any means, this ability becomes Chekhov's Gun.

abilities.name: Because... Boomerangs
abilities.description: Creates 3 strength 26 red strike tiles and a 3-turn purple Countdown tile that removes up to 3 friendly strike tiles and deals damage.

abilities.name: Full Quiver
abilities.description: This power starts as Bola Arrow. When you fire it, this power becomes Explosive Arrow, and there are 6 arrows remaining. Once used, Hawkeye is out of arrows.

abilities.name: No Good News
abilities.description: Restore health to HAwkeye and create 2 random enemy Protect, Strike or Attack Tiles. (PASSIVE) Whenever you match an enemy special tile, gain 1 blue AP and 1 purple AP.

abilities.name: Cant Seem To Miss
abilities.description: (Passive) Whenever a friendly Countdown tile reaches 0, gain 1 blue and 1 red AP. At the start of the turn, fortify 1 friendly Countdown tile.

abilities.name: Full Quiver
abilities.description: This Power starts as Bola Arrow. When you fire it, this power becomes Explosive Arrow, and there are 6 arrows remaining. Once used, Hawkeye is out of arrows.

abilities.name: Deep Breath
abilities.description: Places a 3-turn fortified blue Countdown tile. When it reaches 0, if you have at least 9 red AP, spend 9 red AP and deal damage. Otherwise, deal less damage.

abilities.name: The Quack-Fu One-Two
abilities.description: Deals damage for each green tile on the board, then destroys those tiles. (Does not generate AP.)

abilities.name: Bill of Rights
abilities.description: Converts up to 2 random enemy Strike, Protect or Attack tiles to basic tiles, and stuns the target.

abilities.name: Duck, Duck, Loose!
abilities.description: Creates 3 Invisibility tiles targeting Howard. At the start of your turn, deal damage for each Duck, Duck Loose tile on the board.

abilities.name: Chi Focus
abilities.description: Creates a purple Strike tile. Then, if there are at least 3 friendly Strike tiles on the board, Fortify up 1 of them and gain 2 green AP.

abilities.name: Crowd Control
abilities.description: Deals damage. Then, if there is more than 1 enemy remaining, gains 2 black AP. Otherwise, deals extra damage.

abilities.name: Like unto Iron
abilities.description: Converts up to 2 friendly Protect tiles to Strike tiles, then deals damage.

abilities.name: The Winning Team
abilities.description: Iron Man deals damage to the target, plus an extra damage for every Team Iron Man character on his team.

abilities.name: Girl FRIDAY
abilities.description: Converts a number of the enemys strongest color basic tiles to red. After the board settles, destroys all remaining basic red tiles. (Does not generate AP.)

abilities.name: House Party Protocol
abilities.description: Creates 3 3-turn yellow Countdown tiles that deal damage. If Iron Man would take 1632 or more damage, remove one of those tiles and prevent damage.

abilities.name: From the Ashes
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) Locked in a cycle of death and rebirth, the Phoenix is eternal. When Jean Grey becomes downed, create a 3 turn red Countdown Tile that revives Jean with a percentage of her health and changes this power to Phoenix Force. This power can fire while Jean Grey is Stunned.

abilities.name: Psychic Rapport
abilities.description: Converts 3 random Basic tiles to red. (PASSIVE) When you match 5, improve 3 random friendly special tiles by 104 and reduce 1 random enemy special tile by 104 (to a minimum of 1).

abilities.name: Psychic Flames
abilities.description: Deals damage and creates 2 Strike tiles. If there are 5 or more friendly special tiles, also creates 2 black enemy Attack tiles.

abilities.name: Ruthless Precision
abilities.description: Deals damage and (at level 4) creates a Countdown tile that prevents enemies from healing

abilities.name: Looking for Trouble
abilities.description: Deals damage and creates a 3-turn black Countdown tile that deals 815 damage to Kate Bishop

abilities.name: Because... Boomerangs
abilities.description: Creates 3 red Strike tiles and a 3-turn purple Countdown tile that removes up to 3 friendly Strike tiles and deals damage

abilities.name: Loyal Protector
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy match includes a friendly Special tile, Lockjaw jumps to the front, resisting 25% of that damage and dealing damage to the enemy

abilities.name: Royal Escort
abilities.description: Lockjaw teleports an Inhuman friend to the battlefield for help! He will summon someone different depending on which color is the most present on the board.

abilities.name: The Dog That Bit You
abilities.description: Converts 5 random basic tiles to Charged tiles. (Passive) At the start of the turn, if there is a Charged tile in the enemy's strongest color, deal damage.

abilities.name: Hero for Hire
abilities.description: Fortifies friendly special tile(s), then deals damage for each Fortified friendly special tile on the board. If Iron Fist is an active ally, creates a Protect tile first.

abilities.name: The Defender
abilities.description: Whenever an enemy fires a power, creates a black Protect tile. If Luke is in front, he reduces a random enemy special tile (to a minimum of 1)

abilities.name: Buncha Fiddle-Faddle
abilities.description: deals damage, or damage if there are no enemy Strike, Protect, or Attack tiles on the board.

abilities.name: The Resolute Queen
abilities.description: Whenever an Attack, Protect or Strike tile is matched, if it was a friendly tile, give a burst of health to the team. If it was an enemy tile, gain AP in purple, blue or green.

abilities.name: Entangled
abilities.description: Every turn, if one does not exist, create a Countdown tile that deals damage every turn. If this tile gets destroyed, create Attack tiles.

abilities.name: Hair Meddle
abilities.description: Swaps 16 pairs of random tiles, stealing any swapped enemy strike tiles.

abilities.name: Hide & Seek
abilities.description: Creates a purple Invisibility tile targeting Miles Morales. This power becomes Suprise!

abilities.name: Power & Responsibility
abilities.description: Creates Web tiles, whenever a Web tile is matched, gain AP

abilities.name: Venom Blast
abilities.description: Stuns the target and deals damage.

abilities.name: Bomb-shell
abilities.description: Creates 2 3-turn red Countdown tiles. When one expires, if another exists, remove it an ideal damage. If not, deal less damage to the target and Mockingbird.

abilities.name: Opportunist
abilities.description: Whenever the enemy makes a match-4 or greater, if you have at least 9 AP in that color (including Team-Up), fire a random friendly power at no cost. If not, gain 1 AP in that color.

abilities.name: Secret mission
abilities.description: Destroys up to 4 AP of the enemys strongest color and generates 3 AP in your strongest color. (This powers cost cant be reduced.)

abilities.name: Fist of Khonshu
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy and creates black enemy Attack Tiles. If the damage downs an enemy, restores health to Moon Knight instead.

abilities.name: Lunacy
abilities.description: At the start of a battle, this power becomes one of three random powers: when you match black create a  Attack tile, when you match purple deal extra damage, or when you match green create a Strike tile.

abilities.name: Moonsilver Blades
abilities.description: Deals damage to a random enemy.

abilities.name: Staff of the Living Tribunal
abilities.description: Deal damage, then convert black basic tiles to Charged tiles, or if there are 6 or more black Charged tiles deal damage to the enemy team for each black Charged tile then destroy them.

abilities.name: Vaulting Boots of Valtorr
abilities.description: Mordo takes to the air, deftly striking his target for damage then converting 2 basic tiles of the enemy's strongest color into black Charged tiles.

abilities.name: Power with Purpose
abilities.description: Stun the target for 1 turn and steal AP.

abilities.name: BAMF!
abilities.description: Converts basic tiles to the color most present on the board. (PASSIVE) If the enemy would deal team damage to Nightcrawler, make him Airborne for 1 turn instead.

abilities.name: En Garde!
abilities.description: Deals damage. If you have 12 or more AP in your strongest color, deals more damage instead.

abilities.name: Everywhere At Once
abilities.description: Deals damage for each point of AP in the Enemy's strongest color and steals 2 of that AP.

abilities.name: Takeoff
abilities.description: Creates 2 black Strike tiles. While at least one friendly black Strike tile is on the board, this power becomes Rocket Man.

abilities.name: Nova Blast
abilities.description: Deals damage to the target and creates 1 black Strike tile for each ally still in the fight.

abilities.name: Danger Zone
abilities.description: If there are fewer than 5 friendly black Strike tiles on the board, creates 3 black Strike tiles. Otherwise, Nova loses control and crashes into his enemy, converting all friendly black Strike tiles to basic tiles and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Ultimate Soldier
abilities.description: Peggy lands a well-placed blow, ignoring any Protect tiles and dealing damage to the target.

abilities.name: Legendary Presence
abilities.description: While Peggy's health is greater than 50%, all enemy powers cost 2 AP more.

abilities.name: Do as Peggy Says
abilities.description: Stuns all enemies but the target for 3 turns and places one 3-turn blue Countdown tile that deals damage for each active ally.

abilities.name: Earthquake
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team and shuffles the gameboard.

abilities.name: Coordinated Tactics
abilities.description: reduces damage from enemy powers that affect the whole team. (To a minimum of 1).

abilities.name: Resonance Frequency
abilities.description: Select a tile and destroy up random tiles of that color. Does not generate AP.

abilities.name: Seeing red
abilities.description: If red Hulk is damaged for 342 damage or more, he creates a 1-turn red Countdown tile which destroys random basic tiles. Does not generate AP.

abilities.name: Hammer & Anvil
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team. If red Hulk has 18 or more green AP, this power drains all friendly green AP and deals more damage instead.

abilities.name: Gamma Siphon
abilities.description: Drains the enemy team of all green AP and generates 1 of his own green AP.

abilities.name: Magnetic Repulsors
abilities.description: Attract 2 enemy Attack, Protect, and Strike tiles to the center of the board.

abilities.name: Remote Control Gauntlets
abilities.description: Riri's Remote Control Gauntlets attack from the flank dealing damage to the target and placing a Countdown tile that unlocks and removes enemy Attack, Protect, or Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Selfless Intervention
abilities.description: Deal damage to the target. Her armor reacts to the impact sending Riri Airborne for 2 turns and her target Airborne.

abilities.name: Rockets Pack
abilities.description: If theres not one already, creates a blue Countdown that activates every turn, dealing damage and creating a black tile.

abilities.name: Welcome to the Team
abilities.description: At the start of the battle create 3 Strike tiles. If there is another member of the Guardians of the Galaxy on their team create stronger tiles instead.

abilities.name: Dont Push This Button
abilities.description: Creates a 3-turn Atomic Bomb Countdown tile that deals damage to the enemy team. If its matched away, it deals less damage to the enemy team and damages to your team.

abilities.name: Gloves Off
abilities.description: Rogue grabs onto her enemy, draining them of their power and gaining it for herself. This power becomes Power Siphon. Its color is the target's strongest color.

abilities.name: Sugah, You're Goin' Down
abilities.description: Deals damage and destroys a chosen block of 3x3 tiles, dealing damage and generating AP.

abilities.name: Leading the Charge
abilities.description: As long as Rogue is in front, enemy matches deal 10% less damage for each teammate still in the fight. Whenever the enemy makes a green, red, or yellow match, send Rogue to the front.

abilities.name: Sand Blast
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team, and stuns the target.

abilities.name: Shifting Sands
abilities.description: Swaps random non-yellow basic tiles, converting some of them to yellow.

abilities.name: Sand Smash
abilities.description: Create Protect tiles. If there are 7 or more friendly Protect tiles, remove them all and deal damage.

abilities.name: Teenage Kicks
abilities.description: Stuns enemy and creates Web tiles.

abilities.name: Cherry Bomb
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy and removes a random Web tile from the board. (Cost 1 AP less for every Web tile on the board, minimum of 6)

abilities.name: Kick Out the Jams
abilities.description: Gwen gives each teammate a burst of health and creates web tiles.

abilities.name: Taek-web-do
abilities.description: If Spider-Man is invisible, he deals damage to the target. Otherwise, he stuns the target for 1 turn and deals damage.

abilities.name: Automotive Artillery
abilities.description: Deals damage to the target enemy, ignoring the effects of any Protect tiles, and stuns a random enemy for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Shadowy Acrobatics
abilities.description: Enemy Strike tiles add 45% less damage (to a minimum of 1). While at least one enemy is stunned, Spider-Man is invisible.

abilities.name: Stick Around
abilities.description: If there are fewer than 5 Web tiles, create 2 Web tiles. Otherwise, stun the enemy team for 1 turn and remove 2 Web tiles.

abilities.name: Arachnid Agility
abilities.description: Deals damage to a random enemy, then damage to a random enemy once for each web tile on the board (Max. 3 tiles).

abilities.name: Web Shot
abilities.description: Deal damage. Then, if there are 3 or more Web tiles, convert 1 of them to Critical tiles. If there are 5 or more Web tiles, convert 2 more of them to Critical tiles.

abilities.name: Seeking redemption
abilities.description: Place a 4-turn Countdown tile on the board. While active, Spider-Woman intercepts targeted attacks, resisting 10% of damage dealt. If the attack is below damage, she dodges, resisting 75% of damage.

abilities.name: To Love and Fear
abilities.description: If Love is chosen, removes enemy special tiles. If fear is chosen, creates 3 hidden Trap tiles that deal damage if matched by the enemy.

abilities.name: System Shock
abilities.description: Spider-Woman unloads her stored bioelectricity on the enemy team, dealing damage to the target, dealing less damage to all other enemies, and stunning a random enemy for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Something Good
abilities.description: Convert 4 basic tiles of the enemys strongest color to green Charged tiles. If one of Star-Lords teammates has less than 40% health, give the team a burst of healing.

abilities.name: Something Bad
abilities.description: Steals random enemy Strike, Attack or Protect tiles. If there are none, steals random enemy AP instead.

abilities.name: Bit of Both
abilities.description: Destroy random columns of tiles, leaving any friendly tiles, and dealing damage to the enemy team (Destroyed tiles do not generate AP or deal damage).

abilities.name: Something Good
abilities.description: Convert 4 basic tiles of the enemys strongest color to green Charged tiles. If one of Star-Lords teammates has less than 40% health, give the team a burst of healing.

abilities.name: Something Bad
abilities.description: Steals random enemy Strike, Attack or Protect tiles. If there are none, steals random enemy AP instead.

abilities.name: Bit of Both
abilities.description: Destroy a random columns of tiles, leaving any friendly tiles, and deals damage to the enemy team (Destroyed tiles do not generate AP or deal damage).

abilities.name: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
abilities.description: Captain America calls his allies to his side to defend freedom. Scarlet Witch conjures a spell, Winter Soldier draws his weapon, Ant-Man readies an attack, Falcon rallies to protect, and Hawkeye prepares to stun.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: Hits the target for damage and transforms a random basic red tile into a 2-turn Countdown tile that generates 7 AP in his team's strongest color. For each other member of Team Cap on his team, the AP generated is increased by 2.

abilities.name: Coordinated Offensive
abilities.description: Cap and his team deal x damage to the target. For every friendly Strike, Protect, and Attack tile on the board (up to a maximum of 8), deals x additional damage and destroys 1 enemy AP in a random color.

abilities.name: Court Death
abilities.description: When you down an enemy, deal damage to all of Thanos' enemies and to his allies.

abilities.name: Infinite Power
abilities.description: Create 3-turn purple Countdown tile. While this tile is on the board, Thanos deals an extra 150% match damaged.

abilities.name: Come and Get Me!
abilities.description: Places a 4-turn Countdown tile that moves Thanos to the front at the end of the turn. When the Countdown tile goes off, deal damage to the enemy team.

abilities.name: Court Death
abilities.description: When you down an enemy, deal damage to all of Thanos' enemies and to his allies.

abilities.name: Infinite Power
abilities.description: Create 3-turn purple Countdown tile. While this tile is on the board, Thanos deals an extra 150% match damaged.

abilities.name: Come and Get Me!
abilities.description: Places a 4-turn Countdown tile that moves Thanos to the front at the end of the turn. When the Countdown tile goes off, deal damage to the enemy team.

abilities.name: Mastermind Excello
abilities.description: Deal damage and destroy a selected 3x3 block of tiles. If the team has at least 14 blue AP, deal extra damage. Otherwise, destroy 3 random basic tiles. (Destroyed tiles do not deal damage or generate AP.)

abilities.name: See the Math of It
abilities.description: At the start of your turn, if one does not already exist, convert a blue basic tile to a 3-turn blue Countdown tile that deals damage and converts 3 random basic tiles to green.

abilities.name: Hot Dog Stand
abilities.description: Heals Hulk and converts up to 2 blue or green basic tiles to Charged tiles.

abilities.name: Grand Entrance
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) Hulk smashes his way into the arena and wreaks havoc. At the start of battle, destroy random tiles. (Destroyed tiles do not deal damage or gain AP.) At the start of the turn, swap 1 random pair of tiles.

abilities.name: Gamma Powerbomb
abilities.description: Deals damage and creates random Critical tiles.

abilities.name: The Crowd Goes Wild
abilities.description: Create 3 3-turn Fortified Countdown Tiles. When this tile ticks down, either deal 111 damage to the enemy team, give the Hulk a burst of health, or gain 2 random AP.

abilities.name: Gamma Ray Experiment
abilities.description: At the start of your turn, if there are fewer than 7 green tiles on the board, deal damage and transform 1 random basic tile to green.

abilities.name: Smartest Guy in the Room
abilities.description: Creates 3 Attack tiles, and an additional enemy Attack tile for each non-downed ally.

abilities.name: The Other Guy
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) Banner strains to control his inner nature. At the start of your turn, if you have 10 or more green AP and you dont have one already, create a 2-turn Transform Countdown tile. When it goes off, Banner transforms into Hulk form. (Hulk replaces Banner until downed and makes matches for his team at turn start.)

abilities.name: Punish
abilities.description: Deals damage plus more damage for every friendly Strike tile on the board. If all allies are stunned or downed, this power becomes Army of One.

abilities.name: Merciless Charge
abilities.description: Stuns allies for 2 turns and deals damage to the enemy team plus for every downed enemy.

abilities.name: Weapons Expertise
abilities.description: Creates 1 strength 65 black Strike tile. (PASSIVE) Friendly Strike tiles strength is increased by 8%.

abilities.name: God of Thunder
abilities.description: The Mighty Thor charges his blows with lightning for an explosive attack, dealing damage to all enemies. (PASSIVE) At the beginning of each turn, if Thor is below 50% health, destroys 2 basic red, green or yellow tiles.

abilities.name: Asgardian Tactics
abilities.description: Thor slashes his twin swords through the enemy's defenses to deal damage to the target, ignoring Protect tiles. Thor deals an additional damage for each friendly Special tile up to 10.

abilities.name: Smoldering Fire
abilities.description: Thor creates a Repeater tile that generates 1 yellow Protect tile(s) each turn. This power becomes Raging Fire.

abilities.name: Symbiotic Fury
abilities.description: Deals damage, then destroys a random tile for each enemy special tile on the board (does not generate AP). Costs 1 less for each enemy special tile (min cost 7).

abilities.name: Give and Take
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) Venom's symbiote powers allows them to stalk their prey, but makes Venom vulnerable to fire and sonics. Enemy Protect tiles' strength are reduced by 25% and enemy Attack tiles' strength are increased by 20%.

abilities.name: Lethal Protector
abilities.description: Deals damage and creates yellow enemy Protect tiles.

abilities.name: Symbiotic Assault
abilities.description: Deals damage. If you have at least 16 AP in a colored AP pool, deal damage instead.

abilities.name: Military Might
abilities.description: Drains 2 AP from the highest friendly colored AP pool and deals damage. (PASSIVE) If you have at least 12 AP in any color, this power becomes Alien Weakness.

abilities.name: Take Cover
abilities.description: Deals damage to the enemy team and renders all of Venoms allies Invisible for some turns.

abilities.name: Circling Prey
abilities.description: Vulture goes Airborne for 2 turns. (PASSIVE) At the start of the turn, if Vulture was Airborne, gain 3 green AP , 2 blue AP, and 1 black AP.

abilities.name: One Fell Swoop
abilities.description: Creates a 3-turn Countdown tile that deals damage. (PASSIVE) If this tile exists when Vulture returns from being Airborne, he removes it dealing damage to the enemy team instead.

abilities.name: Hybrid Tech Slicer
abilities.description: Deals damage and destroys up to 2 random enemy Strike, Protect, or Attack tiles. (PASSIVE) Whenever Vulture goes Airborne, drain 10 blue AP for the same effect, also targeting Invisibility and Countdown tiles.

abilities.name: Aerial Assault
abilities.description: Creates a red Countdown tile that deals damage. While this tile is on the board, new tiles have a 15% chance of being Attack tiles on War Machines turn.

abilities.name: Heat Signature Detection
abilities.description: Removes all enemy invisibility tiles and up to 2 enemy Protect tiles, then deals damage.

abilities.name: Gatling Gun
abilities.description: Creates Countdown tiles that deal damage and destroy up to 2 random basic tiles around them, dealing damage but not generating AP.

abilities.name: Tactical Intuition
abilities.description: Converts all friendly Strike Tiles to Protect tiles and vice versa, strengthening them.

abilities.name: That Buzzing Sound
abilities.description: At the start of your turn, if you have at least 7 blue AP, creates random 1-turn Countdown tile that steals 1 AP of its color. If an enemy matches this tile, Wasp stings the target for damage.

abilities.name: Wasp Sting
abilities.description: Deals damage. If the team has at least 8 blue AP, she stuns the target for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Precision Shot
abilities.description: Select a basic tile. Winter Soldier destroys that tile, dealing damage and stealing enemy AP of that color.

abilities.name: Detonator
abilities.description: Creates a blue Countdown tile and 3 random Trap tiles. When the Countdown tile reaches 0, destroy all of Winter Soldiers Trap tiles dealing damage for each. If an enemy matches the trap tile away, create a blue attack tile.

abilities.name: Moving Target
abilities.description: Creates a red Countdown tile that deals damage. If you match it away, deal more damage instead.

abilities.name: Living Legend
abilities.description: Create black Strike tiles and end the turn. If the team has 12 or more yellow AP, also replace all of Wolverine's powers with new powers.

abilities.name: Die Hard
abilities.description: At the start of the turn, Wolverine restores health for each team member still in the fight.

abilities.name: Reluctant Hero
abilities.description: When an ally fires a power, if there are fewer than 5 friendly Strike tiles, Logan loses health and creates red Strike tiles.

abilities.name: Holding Back
abilities.description: Deals damage. When activated, if her team has 9 or more red AP, replace this power with Berserker Fury for the rest of the game.

abilities.name: Savage Healing
abilities.description: Every time X-23 makes a green, red, or purple match, she heals a bit.

abilities.name: Tracking Prey
abilities.description: She creates a purple Trap tile that deals damage when matched by the enemy. If X-23's team matches this tile, it deals 913 damage and creates a black Strike tile. Costs 1 AP less for every friendly Strike tile on the board (Minimum 6).

abilities.name: Yaka Parachute
abilities.description: When you make a match-4 or greater, if Yondu is below 20% health, create a 2-turn yellow Countdown tile that restores health each turn if one does not exist.

abilities.name: Ravager's Ruse
abilities.description: Destroys AP in the enemys highest colored AP pool, then creates a Strike tile for each AP destroyed.

abilities.name: Centaurian Archery
abilities.description: Deals damage. This power becomes Yaka Assault.

abilities.name: When Blood Is Shed...
abilities.description: When Nico takes damage, if one does not exist, create a 7-turn blue Countdown tile which replaces Nico's powers with new powers while it's on the board.

abilities.name: Try Not to Die
abilities.description: Create 2 Protect Tiles. (PASSIVE) Friendly Protect tiles' strength is increased by 15%, but they have no effect on Nico.

abilities.name: Mystical Affinity
abilities.description: At the start of the turn, if you have more Attack, Strike, or Protect tiles than the enemy, increase the strength of those tiles.

abilities.name: Punch Everyone
abilities.description: (PASSIVE) America rushes into battle with a very simple plan for success. America's match damage is increased by 7% for each AP she has in that color.

abilities.name: Ticket to the Multiverse
abilities.description: When you make a Match-4 or greater, create 2 Trap Tiles in that color. When America has Trap tiles in at least 3 colors, remove them all to deal damage and generate 1 AP in those colors.

abilities.name: Fear Not, Mi Gente!
abilities.description: At the start of the turn, if you have more AP than the enemy in at least 4 colors, create a Critical tile. If you have more AP than the enemy in at least 5 colors, also deals damage.

abilities.name: Angle of Attack
abilities.description: Deal damage and stun the target for 2 turns.

abilities.name: Enemy Down
abilities.description: Deals damage and creates 1 green Attack tile.

abilities.name: Aerial Superiority
abilities.description: Create a 4-turn Countdown tile of a chosen color which deals damage. While an Aerial Superiority tile is on the board, neither team may gain AP in its color.

abilities.name: Angle of Attack
abilities.description: Deal damage and stun the target for 2 turns. (Passive) At the start of turn, deal damage to any Airborne enemies and stun them for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Enemy Down
abilities.description: Deals damage and destroys 2 AP in 2 random enemy AP pools.

abilities.name: Aerial Superiority
abilities.description: Create a 4-turn Countdown tile of a chosen color which deals damage. While an Aerial Superiority tile is on the board, neither team may gain AP in its color.
